name: UNTextInputNotificationAction
desc: An action that accepts user-typed text.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, options: UNNotificationActionOptions, textInputButtonTitle: String, textInputPlaceholder: String)
items.desc: Creates an action object that accepts text input from the user.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, options: UNNotificationActionOptions, icon: UNNotificationActionIcon?, textInputButtonTitle: String, textInputPlaceholder: String)
items.desc: Creates an action object with an icon that accepts text input from the user.

items.name: var textInputButtonTitle: String
items.desc: The localized title of the text input button that the system displays to the user.

items.name: var textInputPlaceholder: String
items.desc: The placeholder text that the system localizes and displays in the text input field.
